headline: Trump, Impeachment And Frisbees
abstract: There is a winnable approach for Democrats in the impeachment trial.
lead_paragraph: As the country embarks on only the third impeachment trial of a president in its history, there are many unique features about this moment, but one stands out for me: Never before have we had to confront a president who lies as he breathes and is backed by a political party and an entire cable TV-led ecosystem able and enthusiastic to create an alternative cognitive universe that propagates those lies on an unlimited scale.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
